forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 70. West wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 95. Southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn approaches in Boston, the horizon is adorned with the soft whispers of a clear sky. The city, still enveloped in the languid arms of night, signals an impending warmth when the sun breaks through. You can expect a subtle stir in the air as temperatures glide into the unyielding embrace of the mid-nineties. The gentle southwest breeze will carry with it the promise of an inviting summer day, yet the heat beckons for a touch of moderation in your choices.

As the hours roll on, consider dressing in light fabrics that dance with the wind, perhaps a loose linen shirt paired with comfortable shorts. The day offers ample opportunities for leisurely errands or serene strolls along the waterfront, where the gentle lapping of the waves serenades the busy hum of the city. A midday retreat to one of the myriad cafes—where iced beverages await—will allow you to savor the sweet taste of summer while escaping the more intense rays. While the sun shines bright above, the ever-approaching evening will soon usher in the coolness that follows the relentless heat of midday, inviting a reflective end to a warm summer's day.
